017package org.apache.juneau.http.header;
018
019import java.util.function.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
022
023/**
024 * Represents a parsed <l>ETag</l> HTTP response header.
025 *
026 * <p>
027 * An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest.
028 *
029 * <h5 class='figure'>Example</h5>
030 * <p class='bcode'>
031 *    ETag: "737060cd8c284d8af7ad3082f209582d"
032 * </p>
033 *
034 * <h5 class='topic'>RFC2616 Specification</h5>
035 *
036 * The ETag response-header field provides the current value of the entity tag for the requested variant.
037 * The headers used with entity tags are described in sections 14.24, 14.26 and 14.44.
038 * The entity tag MAY be used for comparison with other entities from the same resource (see section 13.3.3).
039 *
040 * <p class='bcode'>
041 *    ETag = "ETag" ":" entity-tag
042 * </p>
043 *
044 * <p>
045 * Examples:
046 * <p class='bcode'>
047 *    ETag: "xyzzy"
048 *    ETag: W/"xyzzy"
049 *    ETag: ""
050 * </p>
051 *
052 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
053 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common Basics</a>
054 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html">Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1</a>
055 * </ul>
056 *
057 * @serial exclude
058 */
059@Header("ETag")
060public class ETag extends BasicEntityTagHeader {
061
062   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
063   // Static
064   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
065
066   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
067   private static final String NAME = "ETag";
068
069   /**
070    * Static creator.
071    *
072    * @param value
073    *    The header value.
074    *    <br>Must be an entity tag value (e.g. <js>"\"xyzzy\""</js>).
075    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
076    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
077    */
078   public static ETag of(String value) {
079      return value == null ? null : new ETag(value);
080   }
081
082   /**
083    * Static creator.
084    *
085    * @param value
086    *    The header value.
087    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
088    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
089    */
090   public static ETag of(EntityTag value) {
091      return value == null ? null : new ETag(value);
092   }
093
094   /**
095    * Static creator with delayed value.
096    *
097    * <p>
098    * Header value is re-evaluated on each call to {@link #getValue()}.
099    *
100    * @param value
101    *    The supplier of the header value.
102    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
103    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
104    */
105   public static ETag of(Supplier<EntityTag> value) {
106      return value == null ? null : new ETag(value);
107   }
108
109   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
110   // Static
111   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
112
113   /**
114    * Constructor.
115    *
116    * @param value
117    *    The header value.
118    *    <br>Must be an entity tag value (e.g. <js>"\"xyzzy\""</js>).
119    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
120    */
121   public ETag(String value) {
122      super(NAME, value);
123   }
124
125   /**
126    * Constructor.
127    *
128    * @param value
129    *    The header value.
130    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
131    */
132   public ETag(EntityTag value) {
133      super(NAME, value);
134   }
135
136   /**
137    * Constructor with delayed value.
138    *
139    * <p>
140    * Header value is re-evaluated on each call to {@link #getValue()}.
141    *
142    * @param value
143    *    The supplier of the header value.
144    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
145    */
146   public ETag(Supplier<EntityTag> value) {
147      super(NAME, value);
148   }
149}
